description: This file defines a React-like component called NotesSidebar using Qwik framework. It includes props for notes, tags, user info, and various callback functions for note filtering, selection, addition, editing, and user authentication. The component renders a sidebar UI with search, tags, note list, and authentication controls.

methods.name: NotesSidebar
methods.description: A Qwik component that renders a sidebar with notes, tags, search, and user info, using props for data and callbacks.
